name: Royal Flower Picker Hanae
description:
**Downloadable at the Bottom**

--------------------------------------------------

In the kingdom of Springdom, there are beautiful landscapes and fields of pretty flora as the eye can see. It is a beautiful kingdom, and within it are just as wonderful villages. The citizens of Springdom love the flowers and plants. Each year, a group of young kids are appointed as Royal Flower Pickers, hand-picked by the King himself. Their job is to gather the many flowers in Springdoms wilderness and deliver them to the citizens in the villages. 

The flowers have many unique characteristics. 

You play as Hanae, a 12-year old and a new and innocent Royal Flower Picker, who is assigned to go to a desolate village in need of some flowers. Your job? Go out and pick some flowers.

--------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD - Move

[E] - Interact

[SPACE] - Progress dialogue

[I] - Inventory

--------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Sprites:

Village Buldings - Bulbalita - https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/pixel-art-village-buildings/

Village Buldings 2 - Andrew Smith - https://www.artstation.com/artwork/BAyl8

Medieval Deco - Bluecarrot16 - https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-medieval-village-decorations

Water Tiles - Grumpy Diamond - https://grumpydiamond.itch.io/

Music:

Into a Mystical Forest - Ean Grimm

DanMachi 1 OST - Kokoro Suimen ni Utsushite

DanMachi 2 OST - Banquet of the Gods
